lock_tooltip: Lock the scene so you can scroll again
reset_tooltip: Will reset sliders, toggles and scene
reset_scene_tooltip: Will reset the scene to original camera positions
notify_click_anywhere: Click anywhere in the scene to start interacting
lock_disable_zoom: Lock the scene to disable zoom
notify_tooltip: Start the scene so you can interact
